i work part time in the campus library.
i used to be a meat eater but i am now a vegan.
I treasure my ability to swim.

participant_2.background:
I'd brag about my ability to maintain my sanity in the face of the madness that is Toronto summer.
i working in a publishing building.
I play sports with my family and friends to stay fit and have fun.
I would like to be reincarnated as a cat so I can sleep all day and eat sushi whenever I want.
i like to drink.

content.text: I am doing well, how about you?
I am doing well too! I am excited for the weekend. Are you doing anything fun?
I am going to a concert with some friends. What are you doing?
I am going to spend some time in my garden and I might go swimming.
That sounds nice. I love swimming.
It is a great way to relax and cool off.
I agree. What kind of plants do you have in your garden?
I have a lot of different types of plants. I have some flowers, vegetables, and herbs.
That sounds like a great garden. I have a small herb garden but I would love to have a bigger one.
You should do it! It is a lot of fun to grow your own food and herbs.
I will have to think about it. I do not have a lot of time to garden.
You do not need a lot of time. You can just plant some easy to care for plants.
I will look into it. Thanks for the suggestion
